name: Abdul Haseeb
summary: I'm a skilled Full-Stack Developer with expertise in modern software development, especially in the MERN Stack. I'm highly motivated to help projects succeed and always eager to learn and use tech to solve real-world problems, whether with a team or on my own. My goal is to find creative solutions and handle any challenges that come my way.

achievements.title: 2nd Place - COMSATS Projects and Career Expo 2023
achievements.description: Attained 2nd position in the Web major category with AirSpace, an IoT-based automated parking system integrating software development, machine learning, and hardware programming.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
bullets: Developed and deployed high-quality websites, design systems, and cross-platform digital experiences for diverse clients.
Utilized JavaScript, TypeScript, React, CSS, and Node.js to create engaging solutions.
Integrated advanced AI capabilities, including ChatGPT and Stable Diffusion functionality.
Collaborated with clients to align solutions with business objectives.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
bullets: Created diverse software applications for various businesses using latest technologies.
Collaborated within a small team of passionate developers.
Delivered high-quality products meeting client expectations.

education.details: Achieved 2nd place in Projects Expo with AirSpace, an IoT-based automated parking solution integrating MERN Stack, Expo, Socket.io, Python, and Arduino.

education.school: Punjab Group Of Colleges, Mandi Bahauddin

projects.name: Air Space
projects.desc: IoT-based automated parking solution leveraging MERN stack, Expo, Socket.io, Python, Google Colab, and Arduino for real-time monitoring and ML-powered computer vision.
